page.title: 08EVENTS/RECREATION IN STURTON
page.content: THE MAIN EVENT OF THE YEAR IS AN{OPEN {COMPETITIVE SHOW}ORGANISED BY THE AGRICULTURAL & HORTICULTURAL SOCIETY. CLASSES INCLUDE:- PRODUCE,COOKERY, ARTS & HANDICRAFTS AND PHOTOGRAPHY. THIS IS LINKED WITH A{VINTAGE & {COMMERCIAL PLOUGHING COMPETITION, TOGETHER WITH AN{EVENING DANCE}AND VISITING{FUN FAIR.}THE VILLAGE HAS ITS OWN{PLAYING FIELD,}REGULARLY USED BY THE{FOOTBALL & CRICKET CLUBS,}ON WHICH IS SITED AN{ADVENTURE PLAYGROUND.}A {PLAYPARK}FOR YOUNGER CHILDREN IS SITED TO THE REAR OF THE VILLAGE HALL. {HORSE RIDING}IS POPULAR,WITH THE {BURTON FOX HUNT MEET}AT THE LOCAL PUB. PERIODICALLY THE TILLBRIDGE ROAD IS USED AS A{CYCLE CIRCUIT.{OPEN DAYS}ARE HELD AT THE{BRANSBY HOME OF REST FOR {RETIRED HORSES. }
